Aveda Dry Remedy Moisturizing Shampoo - Imported (473 ml) Price: Rs.6000

Aveda Dry Remedy Moisturizing Shampoo 16 Ounce.This product drenches even the driest most brittle hair with moisture leaving it soft supple and touchable. Instantly improves dry hair up to 63% when used as part of our dry remedytm moisturizing system. The patent-pending deep-moisture complex penetrates hair to deliver lasting intense moisture powered by buriti oil pomegranate and palm-derived conditioners.
